Text: Ultimate independent turkey film. Photography is excellent. With exception of the character "Slone" the acting is stiff. Would be a great film dubbed into another language.

Thank you Silkenrune. Beware, this is a real turkey of a film. I really like off the wall turkeys. If anyone can direct me to more please do.
Have fun and drink a beer or two before viewing!

Hey folks, your seeding is excellent!
Hope everyone finds this film as strange and
upside down as I do.
